NA.EB is thirty years old, cooperatively operates an FM radio network
service of eight hours a week and is the only organisation in this
whole field which has a guarantee of longevity* Should JCET, NCCET,
and the Program Center fold up at any time in the future, NAEB would
assume the on-going functions of these organizations* We recommended
and participated in the creation of all three of these groups to help
at this period of great expansion in educational television* It is
anticipated that the ETEC (Program Center) will continue but that JCET
and ftCCET may reduce their operations over the next year or so to the
point of nonexistence*
Time being of the essence, I will leave the balance of the MAEB story
to Skornia and repeat my above statements that you should be members
of NAEB and you should attend the tlAEB Fall Convention*
May I congratulate you upon the progress you are making - I continue to
get reports on your development - and repeat my previous offers of
assistance at any time when I can be helpful*
•
Our own development here is moving rapidly. At this moment the noise
of trip hammers, concrete mixers, and other renovation and addition
activities under us and on all sides of us is enough to drive a man
crazy* We anticipate launching programs by January of '55*
Fy warmest and kindest personal regards* I hope I may have the pleasure
of seeing you in New York*
